description: The Kubelsky sequence: Jack Benny's reported age, sampled annually.
references: The American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language (3rd. ed., 1992) describes Jack Benny as: American comedian known for his ... shows on radio (1932-1955) and television (1950-1965), which featured sketches based on his fictitious miserliness, constant age of 39 ...
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1).
author: David Edelheit (dedelheit(AT)dc.com), Jul 27 2000
